name: Perhaps
description:
A text adventure where you don't have to be the hero. Or the villain. Or anything really, since there's not much concrete plot. 

Featuring:

-Words

-More Words

-10 000+ Words

-Bad Endings

-Characters who may or may not be likeable. I dunno.

-Bread.

-Clicking

-Text Adventure things.

-An absolutely horrible randomized combat system.

-More of that terrible combat system

-Puzzles

-[Click, Click, Click]

-Did I say words?

-words.

-ONE accessible (almost finished) ending
